summary: This bill, the Veterans’ Compensation Cost-of-Living Adjustment Act of 2025, mandates an increase in compensation rates for veterans with service-connected disabilities and their survivors' dependency and indemnity compensation. The increase, effective December 1, 2025, will be the same percentage as the Social Security Act's benefit amount increase for the same period. The Secretary of Veterans Affairs is responsible for the adjustments and publishing the new rates in the Federal Register.
